summary: [Taxpayer] appeals the assessment of service and other activities B&O tax on payments received for allowing a related entity to use real property and improvements located at [the Port]. The Department issued the assessment based on its opinion that the related entity’s use of the property and improvements constituted a taxable license to use real estate. Taxpayer contends the use constituted the tax-exempt rental of real estate . . . . We deny Taxpayer’s petition . . . .
